creator: RightCom
descriptionHtml:
The way a customer remembers the experience after an interaction with your business is, in fact, the reality of that experience. That's why we created RightQ mobile application for Android. It enables you to use the power of RightQ on the go. Whether you are agent, manager or administrator you can use RightQ to welcome your customers, monitor the customer flow and manage your digital signage.

With RightQ Android app you can:
- Add a client to a queue on RightQ - Smart Queue Management
- Generate a ticket for a customer
- Notify the customer via SMS
- Issue a paper ticket to a customer
- View the customer flow in real time per service
- Add digital signage screens to your office
- Start the digital signage screens

RightQ is a simple and user-friendly platform for customer experience management. It allows you to monitor and control the whole customer journey when they interact with your enterprise. The different features provide more flexibility in the daily management and real-time control. Improve the customer experience and increase your results with the platform.
descriptionShort: RightQ is the simple app to manage the customer experience in your office

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Integration of the 64bit architecture for external platforms, Migration of dependencies android.support to androidx, Change version of targeted SDK

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New?

This version of RightQ Welcomer boasts of a sleeker interface with legible text and increased sensitivity.

You now have more queueing insights as you satisfy your customers, and downloadable queue logs to review real-time queue status.

While you explore this version of RightQ Welcomer, we're busy making that experience even better.
